description: Who says you cannot have chocolate for breakfast? These chocolate peanut butter overnight oats are the perfect grab-and-go breakfast.
keywords: kosher, gluten-free, grab and go, make ahead
name: Vegan Chocolate & Peanut Make Ahead Oatmeal
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 cups unsweetened almond or coconut milk (here we used So Delicious)
2-6oz containers of flavored non-dairy yogurt (vanilla, coconut or chocolate works best here. We used So Delicious)
3-4 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder (we use Navitas Cacao Powder)
1/2 cup dry roasted peanuts, chopped ( optional)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine oats, 2 cups of almond milk and non dairy yogurt. Mix well and set aside

Warm up the remaining almond milk slightly. Add cocoa powder and protein powder and mix well until completely dissolved. Warm the peanut butter so you can easily mix it into the oats and pour everything into the oats and stir until well combined
Refrigerate overnight. Add roasted peanuts right before serving. Garnish with your favorite berries.
